{% extends "base_livecode.html" %} {% block title %}Unsound Playground{% endblock %} {% block content %}
class Unsound { static class Bind { class Curry { A curry(B b) { return b; } } Curry upcast(Constraint constraint) { return new Curry(); } class Constraint {} A coerce(B t) { Constraint constraint = null; return upcast(constraint).curry(t); } } static U coerce(T t) { return new Bind().coerce(t); } public static void main(String[] args) { String zero = Unsound.coerce(0); } }
{% endblock %}
